Room.Name: Secret Crypt Passage
Room.ShortDescription: You've stumbled into a secret passage inside the crypt.
Room.LongDescription: The crypt is filled with many secrets. This passage must be one of them. It leads due west to a large room with a number of bright lights. At least the room looks well illuminated as your torch is starting to burn out. It looks like a good place to rest before moving on.
